    string name

    the name of the stop
    int originX

    the x coordinate of the origin of the operating sites relative coordinate system
    int originY

    the y coordinate of the origin of the operating sites relative coordinate system
    string id

    the id of the stop
    bool hasMiddlePlatform

    true if the station has a middle platform, false otherwise
    float platformLength

    the length of the stations platforms
    float platformOffset

    the offset of the stations platforms
